snippet.title: inFAMOUS™: Festival of Blood Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience a new chapter in the inFAMOUS universe.  The city of New Marais has been overun by the creatures of the night and have turned Cole MacGrath into one of the undead.  Now he has 8 hours before sunrise to save his soul or be forever cursed.  Download this complete stand-alone game that features all new vampiric powers and abilites, new characters, and a complete set if UGC tools to create your own dark inFAMOUS adventures.  Only available on the PlayStation®Network! 

(c)2011 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. inFAMOUS and inFAMOUS: Festival of Blood are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Sucker Punch Productions LLC. "PlayStation", and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.  "SONY" and "make.believe" are trademarks of Sony Corporation.
